full_text:
Case 1:19-cr-00830-AT Document 41 Filed 09/10/20 Page 1 of 1
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,
-v-
TOVA NOEL Defendant(s).
CONSENT TO PROCEED BY VIDEOCONFERENCE
19-CR-830 (AT)
TOVA NOEL hereby voluntarily consents to participate in the following proceeding via videoconferencing:
Initial Appearance/Appointment of Counsel
Arraignment (If on Felony Information, Defendant Must Sign Separate Waiver of Indictment Form)
Preliminary Hearing on Felony Complaint
Bail/Revocation/Detention Hearing
X Status and/or Scheduling Conference
Misdemeanor Plea/Trial/Sentence
Defendant's Signature
(Judge may obtain verbal consent on Record and Sign for Defendant)
Tova Noel
Print Defendant's Name
Jason E. Foy
Print Defense Counsel's Name
This proceeding was conducted by reliable videoconferencing technology.
September 10, 2020
Date New York, New York
ANALISA TORRES
United States District Judge
DOJ-OGR-00022110

text_blocks.content: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, -v- TOVA NOEL Defendant(s).
TOVA NOEL hereby voluntarily consents to participate in the following proceeding via videoconferencing:
This proceeding was conducted by reliable videoconferencing technology.
September 10, 2020 Date New York, New York

additional_notes: The document is a consent form for proceeding by videoconference in a court case. It contains signatures from the defendant, defense counsel, and the judge. The document is filed electronically and has a stamp indicating the filing date.
